name: Desperados: Wanted Dead or Alive
description: "Desperados: Wanted Dead or Alive" is the first strategy game ever to combine a movie-based and story-driven atmosphere of an adventure game with the intellectual challenge of a real time tactic game.In this western-style title, discover a game of strategy and tactics played out in exceptional real time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 (32 or 64 bit) Processor: 1 GHz Processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with OpenGL 3.1
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 (32 or 64 bit) Processor: 1.4 GHz recommended Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with OpenGL 3.1

reviews.review_text: One of the best Commandos style games I ever played. I made it through all 26 chapters so many times ... and I am sure that I wont ever turn back on this game. Great story, good graphics, nice maps and little details which will make you smile. Great game from great era of game makers. And the soundtrack!

I have so many great memories of this game from when I was young, so when I saw that this was on steam I just had to buy it!  Sure, it has a few bugs and can be a little clunky at times but once you get these things sorted it can be great fun!  Still as good as I remember it, and glad to be able to play this just like old times :)

Easily one of the best games ever made.   Amazing gameplay, different ways to complete levels. Are you into making noise with guns and killing a bunch of enemies at a time? Or you prefer sneaky one by one knife kill? Or maybe you want to poison your enemy, hide and watch as they kill one another? What about big boom with a dynamite? Your choice.   I completed this game at least 5 times already, and yet, every time I enjoy playing it and play each lvl differently, using different players and combinations. You can really finish a map in 10-15 minutes or 1 hr, all depends on your choice and actions. The farther you go into the game, the more fun maps are.   I will never delete this game from my pc. I know that each time, after completing the game, I will return and start all over again. Game control is simple and game price is just silly. You have nothing to lose.

Works perfect on my windows 7 X64.Someone said it can't run on the latest windows.Obiviously it has been fixed!One of the best games ever!If you like commandos,defintely will enjoy this!  EDIT: In level 10,it began to crash.I thought it is not fixed yet.DON'T BUY IT. And may help if you change to windows classic theme.

Old school classic, never gets old. Childhood flashback!  + Plenty of missions guarantee a lot of fun + Cutscenes + Sanchez (real badass) + Kate O'Hara  - Graphic troubles within WIN 7/8/10 - Missing remake (would be nice hehehe)  Verdict: 10/10

Aside the compability problems, that can be solved with a little tweaking, the game is great. Simple as that.  The environments are well designed, the graphics are beauty, the voice acting is good, the music feels right, the history is nice, the interface is easy to use and the levels have the right amount of challenge to make you explore different ways of playing.  This game has everything it takes to be awesome.  I think it gets a little repetitive, but not to the point of boring.  One of the best strategy games I ever played.  8/10

Desperados Wanted dead or alive is a masterpiece. Best western game I have ever played in fact.  I really recommend it, but as the guy says on the top of reviews, if you have Windows 7 or 8, you 'll have problems.  I have windows 7 64bit. It is still playable, but it freezes sometimes,  forcing me to shutdown computer. It is still worth it though.  Trust me, the Desperados 2 is nothing compared to this!

Loved this game when I was kid; this version is more or less unplayable without severe workarounds and hacking. I appreciate that it's a niche title now, but I expected to get a playable game for my money.
I ignored the warnings from people in the reviews, this new version is garbage.  Shame as it was a good game.
Bugs! Keeps crashing.
Started the game...Crash! Try again...Crash! Search in the internet...Crash!!!!  Maybe the game is good, but have W7 issues.

First of all: yes, this game is nearly unplayable on Windows 7 and newer. I applied an official patch, but it didn't help a lot. At the beginning, the game froze every 5 minuts, so I had to kill it and start again. Then, after few levels, the situation was better. Frequency of freezing was lower and lower. Finaly, I was able to play few last levels without any problems.  I tolerated all of those restarting because: - starting this game on curent computers with SSD disk is really fast - you can (and you should) use quick-save all the time - this old good stealth western game is just AWESOME  I enjoyed the game 15 years ago, and I enjoyed it again.
Overall gread game from childhood times however, when 14 mission is loading, I am getting kicked out as there are some misterious error.. has anyone else same issue?
